title: Well Done Riot Music Team :D

embed.description: Composer: Kyle "Kole" Hicks (http://www.kolemusician.com/) Lead Vocalist: Christine Hals (www.christinehals.com) In the echoes of the mountains and the crackling of the embers, a legend once forgotten is remembered with a song older than any tribe. Ornn, The Mountainsmith will be soon returning. Sung in Ancient Frejlordian.

body:
I just listened to Ornn's Theme (the one with the lyrics, not the Login Theme), and omigosh, the LotR and Skyrim vibes are hitting me hard. The music is so beautiful and perfectly encapsulates the sense of a lonely dwarven mountain life.

This is now one of my favourites in the League of Legends OST (along with Endless Starlight and Bit Rush).

10/10 Riot Music Team :D

replies.body:
As someone who is descended from Vikings _(in theory)_, It really gets me going haha xD

Very well done! :D
